This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I turned on the camera / video and started filming and there it went...
divs: sighting detailsi decided to take a video of the area that i have been photographing and in one video i captured two flying throughout the video at high rates of speed and towards the end of the video they are shown flying off in the same direction. i used a kodak easyshare c653 camera for all photos and these videos. in the second video the ufo is in the first second or two flying west to east. i didn't see the first ufo's in the first video until i uploaded it onto computer. i saw only a dark streak\blurr in the second one through my camera and actually had hoped that i caught it on video but thought initially it might be a bird. i uploaded it, using quicktime i then reduced the speed then enlarged it to see a disk\cylinder shaped object. using quicktime i found that i could pause the video and review it frame by frame. it is definitely disk shaped. no noises other than my dogs are present. i really wish that someone would come to check this out because for over a week now almost every photo i take has these orb shaped objects and disk shaped objects in them and i don't have the proper equipment to film them well.
